title: Live Interview
subtitle: Practice coding interviews with AI feedback in real-time.
noPressure: No pressure, practice at your own pace

steps.solve_desc: Showcase your abilities through interactive problem-solving.
steps.explain_desc: Detail your thought process and methodologies.
steps.feedback: Get instant AI feedback and guidance

chat.title: AI Interviewer
chat.empty: Start the conversation by sending a message

testcase.title: Testcase
testcase.runHint: Run your code to see results

endDialog.title: End Interview?
endDialog.description: Are you sure you want to end this interview? This will finalize your session and generate the evaluation report.

strengths.1: Clear explanation of your approach before coding
strengths.2: Good use of data structures for optimization
strengths.3: Considered edge cases and potential improvements

improvements.1: Consider testing your code with edge cases before submission
improvements.2: Could have discussed space-time trade-offs in more detail
improvements.3: Practice verbalizing your thought process while coding

live.allow_microphone_access: Please allow microphone access when prompted
live.voice_unavailable_fallback: Voice mode unavailable. Continuing with text chat.
live.voice_connection_error_fallback: Voice connection error. Falling back to text mode.
live.speak_now_transcribing: Speak now - your voice is being transcribed
live.mic_permission_denied: Microphone permission denied. Please allow access and try again.
live.network_error: Network error. Please check your connection.
live.session_expired: Session expired. Please refresh the page.
live.voice_connection_failed: Voice connection failed. Falling back to text mode.
live.read_only_mode: Read-only mode: This interview is completed. You can view the conversation and code but cannot make changes.

history.start_first_mock_interview: Start your first mock interview to practice your coding skills

greeting.experience_natural_ai: Experience a natural, AI-driven assessment tailored to your skills.
greeting.random_problem_desc: A random problem will be selected for you. Problem selection UI coming soon!
greeting.challenge_curated_desc: A challenge will be curated specifically to test your core algorithmic thinking.

header_ext.mic_blocked_desc: Microphone access is blocked. Please allow microphone access in your browser settings to use voice mode.

livekit.connection_issue_message: We encountered an issue with the voice connection. You can continue with text-based chat or try reconnecting.

voice_chat.empty: Start speaking or type a message
